thread.title: Listen to A$AP Rocky Read Jane Austen, Florence Read William Blake for Gucci
thread.title_full: Listen to A$AP Rocky Read Jane Austen, Florence Read William Blake for Gucci

author: Matthew Strauss
title: Listen to A$AP Rocky Read Jane Austen, Florence Read William Blake for Gucci
text:
Listen to A$AP Rocky Read Jane Austen, Florence Read William Blake for Gucci Pressed onto vinyl as the invite to the fashion house’s latest show A$AP Rocky photo by Vittorio Zunino Celotto/Getty Images; Florence Welch photo by Samir Hussein/Redferns 
Gucci has enlisted A$AP Rocky and Florence Welch (of Florence and the Machine ) for the rollout of its Fall/Winter 2017 fashion show. The invite to the show (which took place earlier today and is available to watch here ) was a vinyl record with Welch reading a poem on the A-side and Rocky reading another on the B-side. Welch read from William Blake’s Songs of Innocence and Experience , and Rocky recited Jane Austen’s “A love letter from Frederic Wentworth to Anne Elliot” from the novel Persuasion . Both tracks are available to hear on the Gucci app. Check them out on iOS and Android . Below, check out images and video of the record.
